data.title: Great deals, Cheap take out.
data.text:
In my honest opinion, dominos is a spontaneous choice, if you are craving pizza and you want it that moment, you take your phone, use the app and by the time you get to the place, tour meal is ready. 

The app is very useful if you are taking out. The pizza was great for the price, however, I would not venture outside of the pizza menu again. 

The chicken is good but not enough for me to pay the price. The pizza on the other hand is great value for the money.

data.title: Unresponsive and Late
data.text: I have called the store twice now and got hung up on both times without ever talking to a person. I placed this order well over an hour ago and it was supposed to be here in 38-48 minutes. It has been sitting in quality check for nearly an hour. I dont want to pay for hour old food. This is seriously not acceptable.
